translations: adj.不足的，缺乏的；将近的，差一点点的
v.<美>少给，克扣；<美>冷落，忽略

sentences.sentence: She began to berate the police for paying scant attention to the theft from her car.
sentences.translation: 她开始严厉斥责警方对她车内东西失窃一案关注不足。

sentences.sentence: Scant attention has been paid to many of the dubious social and economic assumptions that underlie the plan.
sentences.translation: 人们对该计划背后的许多可疑的社会和经济假设缺乏关注。

sentences.sentence: I paid scant attention to what she was saying.
sentences.translation: 我没大注意她在说什么。
